contents:
BLOSSOM NAILS & SPA
The Perfect Nails Spa In Troy...
﻿MANICURE﻿
 (Add $15 for Gel/Shellac)
CLASSIC MANICURE  ------------------------------------------------- $16
Includes cleaning, shaping and cuticle care, 2 minutes massage and hot towel wrap.Finish with nails polished to perfection.
DELUXE MANICURE  ------------------------------------------------- $25
Includes an classic manicure, sea salt scrub, hydration mask** or parafin wrap**, a 5 minutes hot stone massage and hot towel wrap.Finish with nail polished to perfection.
BLOSSOM  MANICURE  ----------------------------------------------- $35
Includes an classic manicure, blossom scrub, hydration mask** or parafin wrap**, a 15 minutes hot stone massage and hot towel wrap.Finish with True Blue Spa Sugar lotion and nail polished to perfection.
GEL MANICURE  ---------------------------------------------------- $30
GEL/SHELLAC COLOR CHANGE  ------------------------------------- $20
COLOR CHANGE  ---------------------------------------------------- $8
** PARAFIN WRAP:  is used as a treatment to soften and smooth skin.  It is a soft wax with a low melting point, which means that it melts at a temperature cool enough to safely immerse your skin.
** HYDRATION MASK: is an intensive care foot mask that will hydrate and moisturize your feet for plump beautiful skin.
PEDICURE
(Add $15 for Gel/Shellac)
EXPRESS PEDICURE  ----------------------------------------- $25
Includes cleaning, shaping and cuticle care and sea salt scrub.  Finish with nails polished to perfection.
CLASSIC PEDICURE  ----------------------------------------- $28
Includes cleaning, shaping and cuticle care, sea salt scrub, a 5 minutes HOT STONE massage and hot towel wrap.Finish with nails polished to perfection.
DELUXE PEDICURE  ----------------------------------------- $38
Includes an classic pedicure, sea salt scrub, hydration mask** or parafin wrap**, a 10 minutes HOT STONE massage and hot towel wrap.Finish with nail polished to perfection.
BLOSSOM PEDICURE  --------------------------------------- $48
Includes an classic pedicure, blossom scrub, hydration mask** or parafin wrap**, a 20 minutes HOT STONE + hot oil massage from the knee down and hot towel wrap.Finish with True Blue Spa Sugar lotion and nail polished to perfection.
GEL/SHELLAC PEDICURE  ------------------------------------ $43
GEL/SHELLAC COLOR CHANGE  ------------------------------ $20
COLOR CHANGE  ---------------­----------------------------- $10
DIP POWDER
- Get stronger, lightweight and natural long-lasting nails with our easy-to-use dip in powder nails and dip essentials that don’t damage the nail bed. 
- Formulated without harsh chemicals and with added vitamins and calcium to strengthen natural nails. 
- Contains complex bonds that keep it from chipping, discoloring and lifting.
NATURAL NAILS DIP POWDER  -------------------------------- $40
DIP POWDER with MANICURE  -------------------------------- $50
EXTENSION NAILS DIP POWDER  ------------------------------ $50
ADDITION WHITE OR COLOR TIPS  ----------------------------- $5
